nodes.text: This Hapan male was the father of Tasander Dest, founder of the Broken Columns Clan.

Sometime after 8 ABY, when the Dathomiri witch Teneniel Djo married the Hapan Prince Isolder, a Hapan compound was built on the planet Dathomir, where Tasander Dest's father brought his family to settle. After a few years, his father decided to leave, but Dest chose to remain on the planet and eventually founded the Broken Columns Clan.
